name: Coccinella septempunctata

Head: Cannot open eyes during paroxysm
Periodical attacks of frontal neuralgia
Pain worse from any bright object; better, sleep
Aching in temples and occiput
Rush of blood to face
Cold sensation in teeth and mouth
Pain in forehead over right eye, sensitive to touch; from superior molars to forehead
Throbbing toothache
Back: Pain in region of kidneys and loins

details: This remedy ought to be remembered in neuralgias, teeth, gums, mouth, etc. Is awakened by profuse accumulation of saliva. Uvula feels too long. Symptoms of hydrophobia; worse, by any bright object.
